# CT 

Here we calculate the mean salinity across all measurments made between march - september in the NGS subregion. 

```{r read_mld_pco2_data_ngs, echo=FALSE}

nc <- tidync(paste("data/Finnmaid/", "FM_all_2019_on_standard_tracks.nc", sep = "")) 



tidync(paste("data/Finnmaid/", "FM_all_2019_on_standard_tracks.nc", sep = "")) %>% 
  activate("D0") %>% 
  hyper_filter(latitude_east = latitude_east > 57.5 & latitude_east < 58.5) %>% 
  activate("D1,D0") %>%
  hyper_tibble()

dimension <- tidync(paste("data/Finnmaid/", "FM_all_2019_on_standard_tracks.nc", sep = "")) %>% 
  activate("D1") %>% 
  hyper_filter(route = route == "e") 

  activate("D1") %>% 
  hyper_tibble()

```
